hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Umar, meaning, from his father, his grandfather 'Umar, that :he gave a horse in charity at the time of the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ), then he saw its owner selling it for a low price. He went to the Prophet (ﷺ) and asked him about that, and he said: “Do not buy what you gave in charity.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ تَصَدَّقَ بِصَدَقَةٍ فَوَجَدَهَا تُبَاعُ هَلْ يَشْتَرِيهَا
chapter.eng-name: One Who Gives Charity Then Finds His Gift Being Sold - Should He Buy It ?
